function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation in green housing may lead to the propagation of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spreading within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation systems and airflow management.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems, and ventilation monitoring tools.","People":"Inhabitants of green housing and visitors.","Owner":"Architects, builders, and facility managers."},{"Description":"Poor construction practices in prefabricated dwellings may lead to the accumulation of harmful microbes and contagions.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission in prefabricated dwellings.","Mitigation":"Ensuring proper sanitation and hygiene standards during construction and regular maintenance.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial materials, UV sterilization, and automated cleaning systems.","People":"Residents and workers in prefabricated dwellings.","Owner":"Construction companies and facility management teams."}]}
